title.rendered: Little’s Chauffeur Drive Expands with Aberdeen Acquisition

content.rendered:
Expanding our award-winning chauffeur services to the North East with the acquisition of Vigilant Chauffeur Services

We’re delighted to announce an exciting milestone in the Little’s Chauffeur Drive journey – our expansion into the North East with the acquisition of Vigilant Chauffeur Services (Vchauffeur) in Aberdeen.

This move brings together two trusted names in luxury ground transportation and marks a significant step in our continued growth as a family-owned business. While Little’s has proudly served clients in Aberdeen for nearly 60 years from our bases in Glasgow and Edinburgh, this investment introduces a dedicated local fleet and team, solidifying our long-term commitment to the region.

Strengthening Our Roots in the North East

Aberdeen has always been a vital hub for our clients, particularly in the energy, financial, and corporate sectors. As a result, by acquiring Vchauffeur – a business with a strong local reputation for professionalism and personalised service – we’re now able to offer clients in the North East even greater access to the full suite of Little’s award-winning services, available 24/7 across Scotland, the UK, and internationally.

Seamless Transition, Same Luxury Experience

To ensure a smooth transition and, importantly, uphold the high standards both companies are known for, Little’s will work closely with Vchauffeur’s Director, Mark Cochrane, over the next year. With his extensive local expertise and trusted client relationships, Mark will be a key partner in helping us grow our presence in Aberdeen and the surrounding areas.

“After an exciting five-year journey building the Vchauffeur brand and reputation, our recent acquisition by Little’s made perfect sense,” says Mark. “We share the same principles of exceptional service, discretion, and professionalism. I now look forward to working closely with Little’s to further develop and enhance their presence within the North East of Scotland.”

Looking Ahead to Our 60th Year

Furthermore, as we approach our 60th anniversary, this expansion reflects our ongoing commitment to innovation and excellence.

“This acquisition is a great step forward for both businesses,” says Heather Matthews, Managing Director of Little’s. “Combining our strengths will enhance our service offering in Aberdeen and reflects our continued growth as a proud family business with a strong heritage and commitment to excellence.”

Experience Exceptional Chauffeur Services in Aberdeen

Whether you’re travelling for business, attending a special event, enjoying a bespoke chauffeur-driven tour, or simply seeking a stress-free airport transfer, you can now experience Little’s premium service right from Aberdeen. With a dedicated local fleet and expert team, clients in the North East have seamless access to the same world-class standards we’re known for – available 24/7, across Scotland, the UK, and internationally. Consequently, you can expect nothing less than exceptional service, wherever your destination may be.

Get in touch today to discuss your requirements and discover how our chauffeur services in Aberdeen can make your next journey unforgettable.

Back to News

excerpt.rendered: Expanding our award-winning chauffeur services to the North East with the acquisition of Vigilant Chauffeur Services
